title: Toxic Twelvies [Phanny's Hall of Fame]
body:
Aloha,

So I'm making this thread simply because there is not a report feature in the public chatrooms. For the most part the people are cool. There is, however, an occasional prepubescent comedic genius who shows up and tries to impress everyone. The purpose of this thread is to just copy pasta screenshots of the stuff they say. 

So, here it is:

**30/03/2015**

http://imgur.com/oUA5c8J
This guy was great. He kept it going for ages.

**31/03/2015**

http://imgur.com/NiVdy0w
Oww :(





~O wow rito, I didn't want the pictures. :'(

replies.body:
> Phanny Request Ban [Hall of Fame]

ftfy
which is wierder, finding a twelvie in chat or posting pics of twelvies....

Ermm, posting pictures of twelvies would be weirder. It isn't strange that a 12 year old would be playing a game. 

But I don't see how that's relevant. Unless this is somehow a hidden suggestion? For you I could add some pictures of 12 year olds.
